Class LongArray

  • public final class LongArray
extends Array<long[]>

      • getNumEnocdeBytes

        public int getNumEnocdeBytes()
        Get the number of Bytes of encoded data. One byte for storing DataType, four bytes for storing the size, size*8 bytes for storing the data.
        Specified by:
